GameConditionDef.label: emp net
GameConditionDef.description: Some device is being used to blast your colony with EMP rays. It will shut down all electronics until the wave has ended.
GameConditionDef.letterText: An EMP network is bombarding your colony, shutting off all electronics. Artificial EMPs such as this one are short-lived, but always signal incoming shock troops.

GameConditionDef.label: orbital bombardement
GameConditionDef.description: An orbital bombardment is targeting your colony.
GameConditionDef.letterText: An orbital bombardment is ravaging your colony. Your only option is to wait until they run out of ammo.

GameConditionDef.label: laser bombardement
GameConditionDef.description: A laser bombardment is targeting your colony.
GameConditionDef.letterText: A laser bombardment is ravaging your colony. Your only option is to wait until they run out of power.

GameConditionDef.label: psychic storm
GameConditionDef.description: A psychic storm will reduce consciousness and build up neural heat of your pawns. The effect is modulated by an individual's psychic sensitivity.
